programme.title: Naruto is unable to use his Shadow Clone Jutsu against Neji who can see chakra points!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Neji’s battle continues with Neji showing enormous power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Defeated by Naruto, Neji is being taken to the hospital, when Neji’s uncle Hiashi appears.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke’s match is postponed and suddenly, it is Shikamaru’s turn.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: In Shikamaru and Temari’s match, Shikamaru who had the upper hand suddenly makes a surprising decision!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke and Gaara’a anticipated match begins. Gaara eerily talks to himself, as though addressing someone.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of detectives investigate a murder while pursuing their other full-time professions. Welcome to Hollywood Homicide - the only place where you can come to work hungry, horny, thirsty, and broke, and resolve all four by the end of the watch.

programme.title: American Hustle, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on the 1996 novel, this is a mixture of thriller and black comedy. Harry Pendel is the tailor to the powerful of Panama. Harry is known for his storytelling and suits, but soon his tales carry lethal repercussions.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Flag Day, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Sean Penn directs and stars along side his daughter Dylan Penn in this intimate family portrait of a young woman who struggles to reconcile her memories of her loving father with the fact that he was the most notorious counterfeiter in U.S. history.

programme.title: The Gunman, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Eight years after a successful assassination, a former mercenary finds himself the target of hit squads hired to ensure his silence.

programme.title: State of Grace, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan can’t locate the elusive “collector” who calls himself Casanova.

programme.title: Southland Tales, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: SOUTHLAND TALES is an ensemble piece set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, as it stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is an action star who's stricken with amnesia.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Jawbreaker, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: Indecent Proposal, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Demi Moore and Woody Harrelson are Diana and David Murphy, a financially strapped couple who are betting on a quick trip to Las Vegas to deal them a lucky hand. But the odds are suddenly even more attractive when billionaire John Gage ups the ante.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Adventure)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Supposed true story about the Lutzm family whose dream house turns into a nightmare. The unsuspecting new tenants of a house whose previous occupants had been murdered in their sleep.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

programme.title: The Crazies, (1973, Horror)
programme.desc: Its code name is Trixie, an experimental government germ weapon that leaves its victims either dead or irreversibly insane. And when the virus is accidentally unleashed in Evans City, PA, the small community becomes a war zone.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Adventure)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action-packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down The Lane, (1976, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Jodie Foster and Martin Sheen star in this haunting story of a thirteen-year-old girl who lives in an old house with her reclusive father...all alone. Or does she? It seems she is hiding a dark secret, one she is determined to preserve. At any cost!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido's son Yamato's motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy's punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!

programme.title: The Akazaya members who were on board Law's Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn't expect. Kaido's son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what's behind his mask!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desire to be Oden! Yamato’s Dream!

programme.title: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato’s Freedom!

programme.title: Kaido's plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!

programme.title: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy’s All-Out War Begins!

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon/
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!

programme.title: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I’ll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden’s Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won’t Forgive Him! Chopper’s Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasaki’s Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper’s Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It’s Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamato’s Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marco’s Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama’s Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji’s Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 1)

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 2)

programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.desc: Baseado em Romanos 8:28, inspirado por eventos verdadeiros que a vida pode lançar a uma família.
